role_in_ecosystem: Independent third-party organization approved by PCI SSC to conduct quarterly external vulnerability scans for PCI DSS compliance

primary_responsibilities: Quarterly external vulnerability scanning; Identify security vulnerabilities in external-facing systems; Follow PCI SSC ASV Program Guide; Eliminate false positives from scan results; Provide official PCI ASV scan reports; Rescan after remediation; Generate compliant reports; Maintain scanning tools and vulnerability databases; Validate remediation; Document methodology; Support compliance attestation
